Mutual.definition: directed by each toward the other
Mutual.origin: [ orders of protection in domestic violence cases "L. H. Schafran and Norman Wikler"]

1.definition: directed by each toward the other[ orders of protection in domestic violence cases "L. H. Schafran and Norman Wikler"]

2.definition: shared in common[spouses' obligation to support children of their marriage ""]

3.definition: of or relating to a plan whereby the members of an organization share in the profits and expensesof, relating to, or taking the form of an insurance method in which the policyholders constitute the members of the insuring company
